Title: [ANN][ICO]🔥CONNECTY🔥 The blockchain of knowledge and innovation
Body: Essentially, a knowledge economy is the use of knowledge and adopting innovation to better produce goods and services. The growth of the knowledge economy will gradually transform the way that we do business and how we live our lives for the better. Thanks to the Connecty platform the economy will grows, new jobs will be created, and people are more connected than ever before.

Author: kalii
Title: [ANN][ICO]🔥CONNECTY🔥 The blockchain of knowledge and innovation
Body: The implementation of an effective and inclusive knowledge economy requires three main prerequisites: Ease and Speed of Trade, Transaction Security, Trust Environment.  The Stellar BlockChain naturally provides all these prerequisites to support the platform’s 50,000 annual transactions by 2020, thanks to its properties. This is possible with a low cost thanks to a reliable freely accessible and globally established infrastructure.  * Telegram : https://t.me/ConnectyCoin * Facebook : https://lnkd.in/dyBPVMG * Twitter : https://lnkd.in/dB7Mr_3 * LinkedIn : https://bit.ly/2HcWtIp * Discord : https://bit.ly/2qAJ6we * Website : https://www.connecty.io/ * Medium : https://lnkd.in/dGB74zH  ---> https://medium.com/connecty/a-global-marketplace-of-knowledge-on-the-stellar-blockchain-9ccb184fde70 <---

Author: Phil - BH
Title: [ANN][ICO]🔥CONNECTY🔥 The blockchain of knowledge and innovation
Body: The world of crypto has evolved, today is the showcase that is important, marketing in particular. We made choices in connection with our means of development. We talk about hype, principles, the crypto that has the base is there to oppose the destructive economy of globalization which started in 1870 with the arrival of the steam, which allowed the transport and trade markets international and intercontinental. That the ICO are framed is a good thing, it should not include the principles of the current economy  It's up to all of us to make sure not to reproduce, we almost get close to a copy pasted. Thank you for being interested in the heart of the project as you do because when you understand the social and economic impact of Connecty, you are all real ambassadors for the exchange of knowledge.  It is a door that opens for all businesses, from small to large groups. Until today, only large groups have access to knowledge by buying very expensive. It is an opening to the world for the most remote, the most isolated companies, it brings a new balance. Let's give visibility to the magical ideas and geniuses that will make these magical ideas, innovative products

Author: Simpson067
Title: [ANN][ICO]🔥CONNECTY🔥 The blockchain of knowledge and innovation
Body: WOW the new website !  Connecty is a really original project. You don't see that many project with this kind of high ambitions and with so many people working on it (team is 50+ people).  Nowadays we see a LOT of crypto/blockchain project with the same goal, but not many do something about the future, about innovation, about connecting people. I discovered Connecty through their first airdrop campaign and I've been following this project very closely ever since. There is a lot of ambition, lot of work to do to achieve what's described here and on the white paper (https://buff.ly/2t4wNt6).  Lots of amazing stuff are coming and are being teased on the Discord (https://discord.gg/9BdcZqP) so you guys should join now and be the first to know the next steps. Community is great, animations are awesome (riddles and other stuff !) and much MUCH more is coming.  If the beta is a success (in Q4 2018), this project is going straight to the moon !  I believe in you, Connecty, market is wide open !

Author: fabienBH
Title: [ANN][ICO]🔥CONNECTY🔥 The blockchain of knowledge and innovation
Body: I also hope that in the future, once the platform is fully functional, ordinary individuals, who have a passion and want to deepen their knowledge, will come to our platform. For example, a self-taught person who is interested in specific subjects such as quantum, AI, biomimicry, etc., can ask questions to scientists who are experts in their field.  Even lighter subjects such as fishing, how to live such and such fish in such and such an environment, its reproduction, its feeding etc., a simple farmer who wants to go back to old vegetables and know how he was plants before, what is the best place, the best soil, the best time etc., Finally the knowledge is infinite and I hope that as many people as possible will find what they are looking for on CONNECTY

Author: verasovo
Title: [ANN][ICO]🔥CONNECTY🔥 The blockchain of knowledge and innovation
Body: Connecty wants to connect the world of knowledge and the world of innovation!  Thanks to a circular knowledge-based economy, it will be possible to buy knowledge from your peers and from our knowledge store (seminars, conferences, publication, etc). It will also be possible to exchange directly your CTY against fiat via the platform.  With a dedicated token, the exchange will not be reduced to a single financial transaction. It materializes the fluidity of the sharing of expertise, keystone of the advent of a true circular economy of knowledge.

Author: emile12
Title: [ANN][ICO]🔥CONNECTY🔥 The blockchain of knowledge and innovation
Body: hello to all You will find below some arguments that make me think that connecty is a good project.  First of all, Connecty was born in the scientific community, with people who really are scientifics. This is not yet another project launched by a marketing team that decided to do an ICO to make money. The people behind this project are scientists recognized in their fields.  Secondly, the team around connecty (about 60 people) is essentially composed of volunteers who really believe in the project, and are not there for profit.  Thirdly, the soft cap is realistic (1 million euros) we are far from the ICOS with fanciful thresholds and which will never see the light of day.  Fourthly, from the beginning Connecty's team decided to do this under French and therefore European rules, which makes it more complex, but also shows the long-term vision of the project, with the idea of being serious and sustainable over time.  fifthly, Connecty has announced serious partnerships, in particular with the French public investment bank and other partners from the research world, which can only be a guarantee of seriousness.  Finally, Connecty was born from the idea of really responding to a need of scientists. To fill a gap in their daily functioning.  It is for all these reasons that I think Connecty is a good ICO and that it can be interesting to explore the subject further and why not invest a little bit in it.

Author: kalii
Title: [ANN][ICO]🔥CONNECTY🔥 The blockchain of knowledge and innovation
Body: CONNECTY - The blockchain of knowledge and innovation                        Read the connecty White paper  [BOUNTY THREAD] CONNECTY  _______________________________________________________________________________ ________  What is Connecty.io ? _______________________________________________________________________________ ________        Connecty.io is a 3.0 web platform focused on the Knowledge Economy. The goal of Connecty.io is to connect the world of knowledge (scientists, experts, etc) with the innovative world (start-up, small or big companies). The challenge is to promote, simplify and make faster trades between those two worlds to revitalise the knowledge economy, dramatically increasing its efficiency and performance.   Connecty.io desires to become one of the largest exchange places, a sort of a B2B Quora, where people looking for answers can find and trade information with those owning skills and knowledge.  The three main features are: An ambitious A.I engine that will be able to automatically translate any request from common language with simple words to a complex and technical one. This means that the system will be able to simplify any scientific jargon into an easily readable and manageable language. We have as advisor one of the best experts in the field with Olivier Nerot A list of experts and scientists gathering knowledge owners from every field: physical sciences, mathematics, biology, economic sciences, psychology A system that connects and secures transactions and allows the creation of a trustful environment between different people. This system will be based on blockchain technology, using smart contracts to manage missions and a reputation rate system.     _______________________________________________________________________________ ________  Who are Connecty addressing? _______________________________________________________________________________ ________  CONNECTY is a platform for linking, dating and matching between two distinct populations : The knowledge creator creators (researchers, laboratories, universities), and the innovators (entrepreneurs, SMEs, large groups). Our platform is a synthesis of three major features:    The first and main target is the world of research and development (R&D). In 2015, this market was estimated to be worth 1.9 trillion US$ worldwide. In extension, the portion of this market that represented research coming out of labs and used for corporate purposes was only of 7%, corresponding to 135 billions US$. The percentage is low because in the current system, trades are limited by administrative difficulties that remain a hurdle for small trades (small trades that often consist of a few phone calls and a one-day mission).   _______________________________________________________________________________ ________  Why a dedicated token and the use of the blockchain ? _______________________________________________________________________________ ________   The creation of this new currency is necessary for three main reasons:  Rating knowledge trades with currency. the world of science hates money. Most scientists and other kinds of knowledge owners aren?t motivated by money. Their objective is to create knowledge and in general, they are fundamentally opposed to the financial model. Using a token allows us to overcome this hurdle. It will also have multiple use cases on our platform (purchase books, reviews, subscriptions to scientific and tech magazines, tickets for conferences and salons?). The knowledge owner will, in the end, never have to use FIAT currencies if they so desire. They can sell knowledge for CTY, purchase other knowledge for CTY, creating new knowledge in the process.  Setting up a circular knowledge economy. The challenge is to allow the free and unlimited trade of knowledge between people, without restrictions. But trades still have to be measured and quantified to be fair to those who share knowledge. Those sharing the most will be able to use their earned tokens and spend them through our knowledge store or convert them into the currency of their choice.  A reliable and secure trade option for this global scale project. Stellar tokens bring all the positive features of the blockchain: Security, decentralization, confidentiality, very low operating cost. But it also brings aspects of the Smart Contracts technology (automatisation of processes, flexibility, trust and reliable environment...).   The CTY token is a utility type token, namely intended to be used as knowledge currency on the Connecty.io platform, to take advantage of all the services offered on it.  The currency of Knowledge, CTY, will have different roles: To purchase knowledge on the platform from those selling it (certified experts, reliable professionals, scientists, technicians, specialists). To purchase goods & services in our knowledge store, sponsored by professional companies of different kinds (editors, magazines, newspapers, event managers). To allow the easy conversion into FIAT currencies to spend as you wish. Or perhaps, to finance research or business related projects.  _______________________________________________________________________________ ________  How Connecty.io can be used ? _______________________________________________________________________________ ________  Innovative entrepreneur specialized in high precision mechanical (www.expertisevision.fr) :   He develops a brand new machine to inspect mechanical pieces for the watch industry. He need for high precision, high performance and  high quality. He needs to enhance the algorithm that analyses images in order to gain accuracy and efficiency, and detect more complex shapes. He wrote his request on Connecty.io and he now gets in touch with an NASA researcher. He shows his last revolutionizing algorithm he published to our engineer. All he has to do now is to implement it in his new machine, making it the most competitive one on the market.  Investment: two days spent with a researcher and one month of development on his own. Results: a leading market position   Contracts are automated with smart-contracts.Payments are made with CTY (connecty). An additional system allows anyone to purchase directly CTY tokens at market price on our website. CTYs earned by someone for his/her services can be reused on Connecty.io or converted into FIAT currency.   _______________________________________________________________________________ ________  Leading team and advisors : _______________________________________________________________________________ ________   Olivier Alirol - Julien Brodier - Philippe Chometton - Delphine Colombet - Coryne Nicq - Florence Perrier - Samuel Troncon    Idriss aberkane - François de Chezelles - Sébastien Deschaux - Rith Ho Jérôme Jubelin - François Xavier Marquis - Olivier Nerot - Alissa Pelatan Thibault Verbiestn - Franck Zal - Pierre Cappelli - Ali YAzbek  _______________________________________________________________________________ ________  Connecty trailer and videos : _______________________________________________________________________________ ________   Enable english subtitles in youtube settings           _______________________________________________________________________________ ________  Road map : _______________________________________________________________________________ ________     Come and test our Alpha version to be put in touch with the right company among the 30k available in our network. https://app.connecty.io/    _______________________________________________________________________________ ________  Informations ICO : _______________________________________________________________________________ ________      Connecty token symbol : CTY Total supply : 2 500 000 000 Starting value CTY : 1 CTY = 0,01€    Participate in the Connecty ICO Author: kalii
Title: [ANN][ICO]🔥CONNECTY🔥 The blockchain of knowledge and innovation
Body: @juiced resolved the fourth riddle on telegram For more details on his research work I let you read (Telegram/Discord/Facebook)  To summarize the answer to the fourth riddle. We had in the fisrt hint the x-rays that revolutionized the medical field discovered by Wilhelm Röntgen. The hexadecimal points to this link bit.ly/eFf3c. Link that shows us, the Doppler effect in practice. Discovered by Christian Doppler. Third hint was a password locked archive hidden on our website. The password was as follows: RontgenDoppler Once this archive opened it let appear an image of the constelation of the Cignus with surrounded in red the zone where it finds Cignus X 1 (the space is great excused for the lack of precision).  Cignux X 1 is a black hole discovered by a group of researchers (Charles Thomas Bolton). To discover it they observed a strong emanation of x-ray around a star. That emanation didn't make sense. Doppler technology and light variations proved that this star turned in a few days around something then unobservable emanating a lot of x-rays. This is the first time that the existence of a black hole has been proven. Until then it was a hypothetical phenomenon. The meaning 1 + 1 = 3 : x-ray + doppler = proof of the existence of a black hole !  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cygnus_X-1  Juiced you win 9000 CTY + 2*1000 CTY = 11000 CTY for the two hint you shared with the comunity Congratulations again on your research work. Stay tuned for the next riddle.

Author: kalii
Title: [ANN][ICO]🔥CONNECTY🔥 The blockchain of knowledge and innovation
Body: Thank you for your professional look on our team. The connecty team does its best to leave nothing to chance. An MVP of the platform will be online very soon with a large number of researchers and companies ready to use the concept once it will be operational.  We do not work alone and many people in institutional, research and business environments are interested to the concept which could bring many solutions to the current innovation problem !

Oh, did I mention the fundation thing (part of the money earnt will be shared to support knowledge development)?  I'm seriously thinking about getting in the upcoming ICO.

Author: kalii
Title: [ANN][ICO]🔥CONNECTY🔥 The blockchain of knowledge and innovation
Body: Connecty is very happy to announce the birth of its partnership with the scientific network #ARCHES  ARCHES' objective is to eventually generate breakthrough knowledge and innovations by confronting the boundary conditions generated by extreme environments such as the space and planets of the solar system, the oceans and underwater universes, the high mountains, the deserts or the ice caps of our planet, etc.  https://www.arches.urbicoop.eu/  The ARCHES network is certified by the Research Office of the Ministry of Culture. It is also sponsored by astronaut Jean-Jacques Favier and architect Jacques Rougerie.  We thank them for their confidence !
